body:
Currently it's possible to for example invoke activities from inside workflow side effect. This leads to non-deterministic errors on internal wf replay. 

Feature request is to no allow any apis that generate commands to be invoked from inside side effects.

comments.body: More operations may have to be restricted. Not just the ones that generate commands. For example, any command that leads to thread/coroutine yielding the control should be prohibited,

title: [Feature Request] Don't allow apis that generate commands to be invoked from side effects
